summary: Miscellaneous collection of whatever small patches or snippets I'm making and publishing.
descriptionHtml:
I tend to tinker a lot with various mods and things, and sometimes I end up doing stuff that might be worth publishing somewhere.  Instead of making a separate mod for every little thing I may come up with, I figured I'll just make one 'mod' to publish them in.  This is pretty lean just now, I have no idea if/when I'd end up adding more stuff here.

If I make a patch, I try to follow the permissions given in the original mod, but if I've made a patch for your mod and you want it removed - let me know, and I'll do so as soon as I'll see the message.  If you are the author of the original mod, and want to integrate the patch into it - as per note in permissions section, feel free to do so.
author: Kiri

files.name: Minty Lightning MCM patch for version 23.0
